LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PsyfocusStaff.label: eltex staff
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PsyfocusStaff.description: An ultratech staff threaded with psychic focusing materials. While it is a solid melee weapon, its main purpose is to enhance the wielder's psychic sensitivity and neural heat dissipation, allowing more use of psychic powers.
